OrgName: The Debt Exchange, Inc. dba DebtX
activities:
DebtX uses personal information received from the EU or Switzerland for the following purposes:
•	Data self-supplied by investors ("Buyer" data) – to identify institutions that may be interested in reviewing specified assets
•	Data supplied by client management ("Seller" data) – to allow client management access to the platform to review their own data.
With regards to data provided by clients pertaining to their customers ("Client Data"), DebtX uses this data to perform its obligations under its EU or Swiss Client agreements:
•	The negotiation of the sale of debt assets to qualified buyers
•	The processing of due diligence material related to asset sales.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: buyer, seller and client processed data
recoursemech: International Centre for Dispute Resolution of the American Arbitration Association at www.adr.org
